name: Cellular Games
description:
This is a project made in one week for the 2019 VR Game Jam. Gaze deeply into the microscope to enter the cellular realm, a veritable tournament of cell combat. (Look into the microscope for 5 straight seconds and you'll go to the main gameplay) Once inside, use either analog stick or trackpad to steer and move your cell. Your cell has protrusions you can control by moving your hands.

Credits:

AntoniYO - Game Artist

Jtank4 - Game Developer

Sogomn - Pixel Explosion Artist (not affiliated)
